description: Sannokuchi is a small youkai of the http://anidb.net/ch37514 [Nura Clan]. Because his mouth looks like the number "3," he is named as such. He is often seen in the company of http://anidb.net/ch20086 [Nattou Kozou], http://anidb.net/ch37686 [Toufu Kozou] and http://anidb.net/ch37687 [Ko-oni], and the group frequently play Go or hold miniature banquets.
name: Sannokuchi
